title: liuangie001@gmail.com
author: liuangie001@gmail.com
content: Everyone knows that wallets are very safe, but how many people have tried to make money in wallets?

comments.author: LucyFurr
comments.body: Cold wallet is where you install your wallet on a device with no internet connection at all and forever so you can't make money via storing crypto currency in cold wallets.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: what do you mean try to make money?wallets can not form moneyit is simply a device to store your money in it does not have any access or control to your money it is not an exchange where you can gain profit just from keeping money in it or from sending and receiving moneyunless you are planning on stealing someone else’s wallet then there’s no way for you to gain money just from having a wallet alone
